page.title: 14CROOKES, SHEFFIELD
page.content:
I live in an area of Sheffield called {Crookes.
There are good{bus services}to and from the area, it takes about 15 minutes to get to town on the bus.
There are lots of local{shops}in Crookes so it is not too difficult for elderly people to shop but a lot of the small corner shops are closing down now.
Close to where I live is the local {park,}the Bole Hills. In the park there are bowling greens, tennis courts, football pitches and a playground.
The local{school,}Westways is also close by, it takes me about 5 minutes to walk there.
